name: Latvian Jump
description:
This is a small game, with singleplayer and local multiplayer. Where you jump as a small Latvian square. Jump through random obstacles. Just tap, click press the spacebar to jump! Or just hold it when you have a jetpack! 

Get the highest highscore you can! By playing the singleplayer game mode. By getting this highscore, use it as your currency! To buy hats from the shopkeeper Yevgeniy. But the store will be avaible after a certain highscore!

GET IN GAME ACHIVEMENTS!

By playing the game you can get achivements, some are easy, some are hard. But still fun! 

Player customization is avaible too! By buying hats from Yevgeniy, you can equip them on your player! Now isn't that fun? Also there's a hourly challenge! After every 2 hours the challenge will be avaible! By completing the challenge, you can gain three new hats!

Have fun!
